tit.e: Sugatani-onsen (a hot spring located in Nagahama City, Shiga Prefecture)
Sugatani-onsen (a hot spring located in Nagahama City, Shiga Prefecture)

sen.j: 須賀谷温泉（すがたにおんせん）は、滋賀県長浜市（旧国近江国）にある温泉。
sen.e: Sugatani onsen is a hot spring located in Nagahama City, Shiga Prefecture (formerly, Omi Province)
Sugatani onsen is a hot spring located in Nagahama City, Shiga Prefecture (formerly, Omi Province).
sen.cmt: ピリオドなどを補足しました。
sen.e: Sugatani onsen is a hot spring located in Nagahama City, Shiga Prefecture (formerly, Omi Province).

sen.j: 鉄道：JR北陸本線河毛駅下車、タクシーで約10分。
sen.e: Railway: Kawake Station, JR Hokuriku Main Line; approximately ten minutes by taxi
Railway: From Kawake Station, JR Hokuriku Main Line, approximately 10 minutes by taxi.
Railway: From Kawake Station, JR Hokuriku Main Line, approximately 10 minutes by taxi.
(Courtesy bus service is available, reservation required)
(Courtesy bus service is available, reservation required.)
sen.cmt: ピリオド補足しました。
sen.e: (Courtesy bus service is available, reservation required.)

sen.j: 車：北陸自動車道長浜インターチェンジから滋賀県道37号中山東上坂線を左折して国道東上坂交差点まで直進し、国道東上坂交差点で左折して国道365号を北上。
sen.e: Car: From Nagahama Interchange of Hokuriku Expressway, turn to the left to Shiga Prefectural Road 37 Nakayama-Higashikozaka Line, drive straight until Higashikozaka Intersection of National Road, turn to the left at Higashikozaka Intersection of the National Road and drive on National Road 365 to the north.

Car: From Nagahama Interchange of Hokuriku Expressway, turn to the left to Shiga Prefectural Road 37 Nakayama-Higashikozaka Line, drive straight, turn to the left at Higashikozaka Intersection of the National Road and drive on National Road 365 to the north.
sen.cmt: 重複する表現を削除しました。
sen.e: Car: From Nagahama Interchange of Hokuriku Expressway, turn to the left to Shiga Prefectural Road 37 Nakayama-Higashikozaka Line, drive straight, turn to the left at Higashikozaka Intersection of the National Road and drive on National Road 365 to the north.

sen.j: 田川交差点の先で分岐する一般道沿いにある。
sen.e: It is located along the local road branched after Tagawa Intersection.
It is located along the local road branched after Tagawa Intersection.
It is located along the local road branched after Tagawa Intersection.

sen.j: -カルシウム・マグネシウム
炭酸水素塩泉（ヒドロ炭酸鉄泉）
sen.e: hydrogen carbonate spring (ヒドロ炭酸鉄泉)
sen.cmt: 「ヒドロ炭酸鉄泉」の訳語が確認できていません。
「 (ヒドロ炭酸鉄泉)」と「炭酸水素塩泉」は同義と思われるため、漢字削除しました。
訳漏れ。「木之本町」を訳出しました。

sen.j: 戦国時代 (日本)には小谷城主浅井長政をはじめ、お市の方や淀殿が湯治に訪れたとされ、湖北地域の温泉としては歴史が古いとされる。
sen.e: It is said that, in the Sengoku period (period of warring states)(Japan), Nagamasa ASAI, who was the castellan of Odani-jo Castle, Oichi no kata and Yodo-dono (Yodogimi) visited for toji (hot spring cure) and it is also said that it has a long history as a hot spring in Kohoku region.

It is said that, in the Sengoku period (period of warring states) (Japan), Nagamasa AZAI, who was the castellan of Odani-jo Castle, Oichi no kata and Yodo-dono (also known as Yodogimi) visited for toji (hot spring cure) and that it has a long history as a hot spring in Kohoku region.
sen.cmt: 読み、表現を変えました。
sen.e: It is said that, in the Sengoku period (period of warring states) (Japan), Nagamasa AZAI, who was the castellan of Odani-jo Castle, Oichi no kata and Yodo-dono (also known as Yodogimi) visited for toji (hot spring cure) and that it has a long history as a hot spring in Kohoku region.

sen.j: 現在の施設は1971年（昭和46年）にオープンしている。
